com.github.moribund.images

Interface SpriteComponent


  • @Component(modules=SpriteModule.class)
public interface SpriteComponent
    The SpriteComponent uses Dagger 2's Component system to generate a the sprite dependencies. This differs to, for example, MusicComponent as it allows for the Inject annotation by providing multiple inject methods for the respective classes using this component.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void inject(GameScreen gameScreen)
      This method allows for injection of the GameScreen class.
      void inject(SpriteDrawer spriteDrawer)
      This method allows for injection of the SpriteDrawer class.

    • Method Detail

        Parameters:
        gameScreen - The given GameScreen class.

      • inject

        void inject(SpriteDrawer spriteDrawer)
        This method allows for injection of the SpriteDrawer class.
        Parameters:
        spriteDrawer - The given SpriteDrawer class.
